summary:
Experienced leader who manages cross-functional teams to deliver complex projects across multiple geographies.  Skilled in multiple areas:
AI and Machine Learning (Chatbots, Text Analytics), Customer Journey Design, Measurement & Insights, Quality Management, Knowledge Management, Data Analysis, Business Analysis, Enterprise Architecture, Design Thinking, Strategy, Budget Management, Systems Thinking, Shared Value Innovation.
